thread.title: Greek PM to seek confidence vote after Aug. 20- govt official
thread.title_full: Greek PM to seek confidence vote after Aug. 20- govt official | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Greek PM to seek confidence vote after Aug. 20- govt official
text:
ATHENS Aug 14 Greek Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras will seek a confidence vote after August 20 when a debt repayment to the European Central Bank falls due, a government official said on Friday after his coalition won approval for a new bailout accord.
Tsipras easily managed to cross the 151-vote threshold in the 300-seat chamber to pass the bill, thanks to support from the opposition.
(Reporting by Lefteris Papadimas; Writing by George Georgiopoulos; Editing by Karolina Tagaris)
